AbandonedChild23.title: покинуте дитя
AbandonedChild23.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] народився хворобливим. Думаючи, що [PAWN_pronoun] стане тягарем для племені, батьки [PAWN_possessive] кинули [PAWN_objective] на призволяще. Якимось чином, [PAWN_pronoun] вижив(-ла).

AbandonedChild30.title: покинуте дитя
AbandonedChild30.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] був дотепною та веселою дитиною. Одного дня, [PAWN_pronoun] загубився подалі від [PAWN_possessive] багатих батьків, і зрештою заблукав до нібито невикористанного складу руди. Завдяки технології клонування, [PAWN_possessive] батьки вирішили, що час, витрачений на пошуки [PAWN_objective], краще виділити на клонування кращого сина.

AbandonedOrphan61.title: покинута сирота
AbandonedOrphan61.desc: Покинутий після народження, [PAWN_nameDef] розпочав [PAWN_possessive] життя у дитячому притулку. \n\nБудучи негідником та поганцем, [PAWN_pronoun] став продуманим баламутом.

Abductee43.title: викрадений
Abductee43.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] був викрадений у молодому віці та змушений прислужувати на піратському судні.

Abductee7.title: викрадений
Abductee7.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] був викрадений ксено-людьми коли [PAWN_pronoun] був ще немовлям. Вони проводили робили досліди над [PAWN_objective], щоб краще зрозуміти [PAWN_possessive] генетичну структуру.\n\nКоли [PAWN_pronoun] виріс, [PAWN_nameDef] став достатньо великим і дужим за [PAWN_possessive] викрадачів та втік.

AcademyStudent58.title: студент академії
AcademyStudent58.desc: Як і будь-який вправний космо-кадет, [PAWN_nameDef] ходив до школи. [PAWN_pronoun] був дуже високим і видомим через [PAWN_possessive] гарний вигляд.\n\nХоча [PAWN_pronoun] більше хвилювався за [PAWN_possessive] зачіску, ніж за [PAWN_possessive] оцінки, [PAWN_pronoun] якось вдалося скласти випускні іспити.

AccursedChild88.title: окаянне дитя
AccursedChild88.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] народився в пік місячного затемнення. Старійшини оголосили [PAWN_objective] дитям темряви та взяли [PAWN_objective] під свою опіку.\n\nВсе дитинство [PAWN_possessive] провів у вивченні знань та ритуалів [PAWN_possessive] народу - доки не настав день покликання.

AceFighterPilot54.title: пілот-Ас винищувача
AceFighterPilot54.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] вдалося закінчити Зоряну Академію та відзначитися як пілот-Ас винищувача під час трьох кампаній проти більш прогресивних культур-агресорів. \n\nОднак, після одного жорстокого бою, [PAWN_possessive] корабель-носій було знищено, а [PAWN_pronoun] опинився у скрутному становищі. Не маючи іншого шляху, [PAWN_pronoun] заліз у [PAWN_possessive] рятувальну капсулу та почав молитися.

AcolyteOfStars6.title: аколіт зірок
AcolyteOfStars6.desc: Вічний мрійник, [PAWN_nameDef] подорожував по всесвіту, щоб знайти те, що, як [PAWN_pronoun] відчував, кликало до нього. \n\n[PAWN_pronoun] ставав бідніший і бідніший, але використовував усе, що міг, щоб продовжити пошуки.

Actor72.title: актор
Actor72.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] подорожував с акторською трупою, усюди виступаючи перед повними залами та люблячою аудиторією. [PAWN_pronoun] був перфекціоністом, тому [PAWN_possessive] робив власний реквізит та костюми, а не використовував ті, що [PAWN_pronoun] давали.

AddictionCounsel60.title: куратор з залежності
AddictionCounsel60.desc: Після одужання від залежності від 'чипу насолоди', [PAWN_nameDef] прийняв шлях ненасилля і поклявся допомагати іншим. \n\n\Подорожуючи між громадами, [PAWN_pronoun] використовував медицину, щоб допомогти тим, хто боровся з власними залежностями.

Adventurer19.title: шукач пригод
Adventurer19.desc: Жага до пригод [PAWN_nameDef] привела [PAWN_objective] на багато планет. [PAWN_pronoun] відвідав найяскравіші блискучі світи і найтемніші, розірвані війною токсичні планети в прагненні [PAWN_possessive] знайти новину і захват.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] працював якомога менше, часто ігноруючи етичні межі заради швидкого заробітку. Серед усіх типів праці, [PAWN_pronoun] ненавидів кухарство найбільше.

AdventuringChild30.title: авантюрне дитя
AdventuringChild30.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] ріс, щоб стати інженером. Багато років, [PAWN_pronoun] планував втекти на вантажному кораблі і почати нове, сповнене пригодами життя.\n\nОдної ночі, після того, як [PAWN_possessive] батьки заснули, [PAWN_pronoun] зміг проникнути на борт транспортного корабля як раз перед тим, як судно покинуло порт.

AdventurousWeirdo55.title: дивак-авантюрист
AdventurousWeirdo55.desc: Креативний, але дивний індивід, [PAWN_nameDef] присвятив [PAWN_possessive] життя [PAWN_possessive] поєднаній пристрасті до історії середньовічного світу і високих технологій.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] завжди був захоплений ідеєю становлення 'небесним лицарем', з сяючими обладунками і величезним мечем.

AdventurousYouth70.title: авантюрна молодь
AdventurousYouth70.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] дослідив все навколо величезного маєтку [PAWN_possessive] родини, знаходячи маленькі дива природи, сховані в довколишніх катакомбах, річках та печерах.\n\nПід час [PAWN_possessive] підліткових років, [PAWN_nameDef] нажив собі численних ворогів

AerospaceEngineer44.title: аерокосмічний інженер
AerospaceEngineer44.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] був інженером, відповідальним за виробництво авіації та космічних кораблів. [PAWN_pronoun] зосереджувався на покращенні ліній виробництва, і був відомий за [PAWN_possessive] експертність в технічних і науково-дослідних питаннях.

AIProgrammer22.title: програміст ШІ
AIProgrammer22.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] служив у підррозділі військової робототехніки, і розробляв розумніші бойові ШІ.\n\nЗа весь той час, поки [PAWN_pronoun] служив в підрозділі, [PAWN_pronoun] жодного разу не спілкувався з іншою людиною. [PAWN_pronoun] використовував весь [PAWN_possessive] час спілкуючись з ШІ, який [PAWN_pronoun] розробляв.

AIResearcher94.title: дослідник ШІ
AIResearcher94.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] був досвідченим експертом з штучного інтеллекту, робототехніки, і інтерактивної голографії. [PAWN_possessive] дружба з штучними інтелектами, які [PAWN_pronoun] створив, дала [PAWN_objective] впевненість для взаємодії з реальним илюдьми, і [PAWN_pronoun] скоро став майстром з особистої коммунікації.

AlcoholicTrucker93.title: дальнобійник-алкоголік
AlcoholicTrucker93.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] був космічним дальнобійником, що працював у Arcknight Industries, коли [PAWN_pronoun] вбив [PAWN_possessive] дружину і доньку в аварії.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] тіло було відновлено за допомогою експереминтаьної нано-генетичної терапії. Тепер [PAWN_possessive] м'язи постійно відновлюються і застигають, і кожний рух роздирає тканини заново. [PAWN_pronoun] витримує біль в тиші.

AmateurAstronomer77.title: астроном-аматор
AmateurAstronomer77.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] захоплювався астрономією. [PAWN_pronoun] міг годинами дивитись на планети й туманності крізь [PAWN_possessive] телескоп.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] отримав лаври за знаходження невеличкої комети, яка, в майбутньому, зіткнулась би з недалеким супутником і зірвала б там операції з видобутку корисних копалин.

AmateurBotanist79.title: ботанік-аматор
AmateurBotanist79.desc: Після багатьох років, витраченних на повзання в землі, [PAWN_nameDef] виявив, що [PAWN_pronoun] має талант до садівництва. Замість того, щоб навчитись готувати їжу, яку [PAWN_pronoun] виростив, [PAWN_pronoun] просто вирощував більше й більше.

AmateurEngineer3.title: інженер-аматор
AmateurEngineer3.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] виріс у родині з воєнним та інженерним минулим. [PAWN_pronoun] хотів приєднатись до армії, але [PAWN_possessive] батькові не сподобалась ідея, тому [PAWN_possessive] iнтерес змінив напрям до великих літаючих машин і витвирів інженерії. [PAWN_pronoun] таємно сподівався, що одного дня це призведе [PAWN_objective] до життя, присвяченого дослідженням галактики.

AnarchistRebel77.title: анархіст-повстанець
AnarchistRebel77.desc: Після буття покинутим під час спецоперації, [PAWN_nameDef] поклявся помститися державі. [PAWN_pronoun] сформував анархістичну групу, присвячену знищенню урядів центральних світів.\n\nПісля завеликої кількості смертельних ситуацій, і замалої кількості успіхів, [PAWN_nameDef] втік на зовнішне кільце.

AngryStudent88.title: агресивний студент
AngryStudent88.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] тренувався заради [PAWN_possessive] мрії працювати в міський раді [PAWN_possessive] рідного міста.\n\nЧерез причини, які [PAWN_pronoun] так ніколи і не зрозумів, [PAWN_pronoun] був постійно жертвою знущань [PAWN_possessive] однокласників. [PAWN_pronoun] вирішив придушувати [PAWN_possessive] злість.

AnimalCaretaker20.title: доглядач тварин
AnimalCaretaker20.desc: Народжений на середньовічній фермі, [PAWN_nameDef] займався доглядом за домашніми тваринами. [PAWN_pronoun] виріс з любов'ю до них.\n\nЗ часом, [PAWN_pronoun] навчився приручати диких тварин. [PAWN_pronoun] мріяв зустріти трумбо одного дня й приручити його.

AnimalLabTech39.title: технік з ветеринарної лабораторії
AnimalLabTech39.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] працював техніком в лабораторії, що досліджувала тварин.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] витрачав [PAWN_possessive] дні, піклуючись про тварин і прибираючи за ними. [PAWN_pronoun] мріяв мати [PAWN_possessive] власну лабораторію одного дня.

AntisocialChild83.title: асоціальна дитина
AntisocialChild83.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] мав нестачу типових соціальних навичок, і уникав соціальної взаємодії.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] отримував задоволення лише від постійної роботи. [PAWN_pronoun] особливо не любив говорити з дуже креативними або винятковими індивідами.

ApocalypseChild23.title: дитя апокаліпсису
ApocalypseChild23.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] провів [PAWN_possessive] дитинство в пост-апокаліптичному світі. [PAWN_pronoun] боровся за виживання з молодих років, на планеті де довіри не існує. \n\n[PAWN_pronoun] говорив всім що [PAWN_pronoun] не пощастило.

ApocalypseSurvivor23.title: свідок апокаліпсису
ApocalypseSurvivor23.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] народився у складні часи на [PAWN_possessive] планеті, коли кліматичні зміни загрожували масовими голодом та потопами. Поки [PAWN_pronoun] зростав, ситуація погіршилась - мільярди загинули і мирні держави занурилися в анархію. [PAWN_nameDef] і [PAWN_possessive] батьки робили все, щоби вижити.

ApprenticeOracle83.title: учень оракула
ApprenticeOracle83.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] був обраний в ранньому віці старійшинами племені, щоби зберігати священні рітуали Оракула.\n\nНестримно допитлива дитина, [PAWN_nameDef] влаштував релігійну кризу для [PAWN_possessive] племені, коли [PAWN_pronoun] випадково клацнув вимикачем, відкривши "гробниці" Богів - капсулши для кріптосну з декількома дуже спантеличеними пращурами.

ApprenticeSmith37.title: учень коваля
ApprenticeSmith37.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] виріс, допомагаючи у кузні [PAWN_possessive] батька.

Вони були одними з останніх ковалів на планеті, які використовували традиційні методи ковальства. Вони навіть самі збирали деякі матеріали.

Іноді, після праці, [PAWN_nameDef] практикувався з мечами, які [PAWN_pronoun] скував.

Archaeologist85.title: археолог
Archaeologist85.desc: [PAWN_pronoun] жив у пастці нудоти і буденності. Одного дня, [PAWN_pronoun] застрибнув на корабель щоб навчитись археології і побачити всесвіт.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] навчився виживанню. [PAWN_pronoun] також вивчав людей - хоча [PAWN_pronoun] завжди розумів мертвих краще, ніж живих.

Archer25.title: лучник
Archer25.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] бився за [PAWN_possessive] плем'я. [PAWN_pronoun] спеціалізувався в використанні луків, пілумів та іншої зброї дальнього бою.

Architect28.title: архітектура
Architect28.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] проектував та будував будівлі. У [PAWN_possessive] рідному блискучому світі, більшість технічних аспектів архітектури оброблялися ШІ. Це дало [PAWN_objective] можливість просунути художні межі ремесла, але також означало, що [PAWN_pronoun] ніколи не мав бруднити [PAWN_possessive] руки на будмайданчиках.

ArchotechSpy75.title: шпигун архотеха
ArchotechSpy75.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] був дослідником кібернетики. Під час дослідження трансцендованого світу [PAWN_pronoun] створив заміцні зв'язки з [PAWN_possessive] піддослідними. З часом, архотех взяв [PAWN_objective] на службу, і використовував [PAWN_objective] як шпигуна.\n\nКоли [PAWN_pronoun] пізніше повстав проти [PAWN_possessive] нелюдяного володаря, він відправив механоїдів крізь космічний простір, щоб знайти і знищити [PAWN_objective].

ArmyCook0.title: військовий кухар
ArmyCook0.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] приєднався до армії як робітник і витратив більшу частину [PAWN_possessive] часу готуючи їжу і ремонтуючи. Коли [PAWN_pronoun] був на небезпечній планеті, [PAWN_pronoun] пройшов крізь базову підготовку з стрільби й виживання.

ArmyScientist35.title: вченим армії
ArmyScientist35.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] робив наукові дослідження для планетарної армії. [PAWN_pronoun] вивчав воєнні сценарії та розробляв системи озброєння, щоб допомогти вигравати битви з мінімальними зусиллями.

ArmySergeant16.title: сержант армії
ArmySergeant16.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] служив в армії [PAWN_possessive] країни, командуючи малими підрозділами в якості унтер-офіцера.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] відзначився створенням тактично обгрунтованих планів, незважаючи на складні обставини.

Aromatherapist80.title: ароматерапевт
Aromatherapist80.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] практикував ароматерапію, використовуючи есенції вирощених вдома рослин.

ArtfulDodger78.title: спритний хитрун
ArtfulDodger78.desc: Виростаючи на одній з урб-планет, [PAWN_nameDef] довелося постійно відстоювати [PAWN_possessive] життя. [PAWN_pronoun] ніколи нікому не довіряв, покладаючись на [PAWN_possessive] переконливість і хитрість, щоб вижити.\n\nНезабаром [PAWN_pronoun] почав вправно володіти як вогнепальною зброєю та ножами, так і словом.

ArtifactHunter48.title: мисливець за артефактами
ArtifactHunter48.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] став депресивним та втратив інтерес до життя. [PAWN_pronoun] подорожував з планети на планету, шукаючи психо артефактів серед руїн механоїдів в надії, що вони вилікують біль у [PAWN_possessive] душі.\n\nРетельне планування та непохитна зброя в руці берегли життя [PAWN_nameDef].

ArtificerRampant95.title: нестримний винахідник
ArtificerRampant95.desc: Підживлюваний радістю відкриття й [PAWN_possessive] мегаломанією, [PAWN_nameDef] відправився винаходити нові пристрої і покращувати існуючі, порушуючи при необхідності закони й традиції.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] зформував команду, щоб збирати матеріали для [PAWN_possessive] роботи - і знищення сторонніх людей, які можуть втручатися.

Artilleryman28.title: артилерист
Artilleryman28.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] вантажив снаряди та націлював артилерію щоб здалеко обстрілювати ворогів [PAWN_possessive] армії.

ArtisanFarmer23.title: фермер-ремісник
ArtisanFarmer23.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] виріс на утопічній фермі [PAWN_possessive] батьків. Вони були однією з останніх ферм на планеті, що віддавали перевагу традиційним методам ведення сільського господарства, ніж передовим технологіям.

ArtisticWeirdo56.title: креативний дивак
ArtisticWeirdo56.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] виріс в домі біля жвавого метрополісу.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] мав хист у мистецтві і креативній праці, але часто вів себе дивно, і тому мав небагато друзів.

ArtsPatron54.title: покровитель мистецтв
ArtsPatron54.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] керував інвестиціями [PAWN_possessive] родини в мистецтво.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] обирав митців для покровительства і працював з ними для створення робіт, які найбільш вихваляли [PAWN_possessive] родину, Імперську церкву, і саму Імперію.

ArtStudent79.title: Студент-митець
ArtStudent79.desc: Після років практики, Фрейя змогла вступити в художній університет, і покращити свої навички. Вона шукала роботу в індустрії мистецтва, закінчивши університет з хорошими оцінками. Вона досягла певного прогресу, з отриманням комісій, зумівши досягти гідного рівня життя від серця.

AsceticPriest84.title: аскетичний священик
AsceticPriest84.desc: Після прийняття обітниці мовчання, [PAWN_nameDef] приєднався до монастирю, щоб провести [PAWN_possessive] дні в тихій задумі.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] знайшов щастя, вирощуючи овочі в саду і роблячи сир в підвалах монастиря.

AspergersRebel13.title: повстанець з Аспергером
AspergersRebel13.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] виріс як повстанець а колись ківітнучому світі, зруйнованому війною.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] синдром Аспергера значив, що [PAWN_pronoun] мав труднощі з соціалізаціями і був нездатний виявляти турботу, але [PAWN_pronoun] вивчив навички на кшталт досліджень і стрільби дуже швидко.

AspiringEngineer58.title: перспективний інженер
AspiringEngineer58.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] завжди був захоплений гаджетами й механізмами. [PAWN_pronoun] розбирав і збирав назад майже все, що [PAWN_pronoun] міг знайти.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] звик ремонтувати іграшки, принесені [PAWN_objective] іншими дітьми, і навіть відремонтував декілька пристроїів, належавших [PAWN_possessive] дорослим клієнтам.

AspiringPhysicist47.title: перспективний фізик
AspiringPhysicist47.desc: Дочка інженера й лікаря, [PAWN_nameDef] мала дуже насичене багате інтелектуальним розвитком раннє життя. Після візиту в лабораторію з фізики, [PAWN_pronoun] вирішила, що [PAWN_pronoun] хотіла стати квантовим фізиком.\n\nВкушена верблюдом, збита з лошаді і переслідувана собаками, [PAWN_nameDef] розвинула страх тварин.

AspiringPopIdol28.title: починаючий поп-ідол
AspiringPopIdol28.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] вчився танецювати й співати, щоб стати наступним поп-ідолом. [PAWN_pronoun] виріс під опікою власників компанії.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] ніколи не займався фізичною працею, але багато вивчив про музику й етикет.

Assassin20.title: асасин
Assassin20.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] був професійним вбивцею. [PAWN_pronoun] був холоднокровним, розважливий, та мав гарний прибуток. В цій справі відсутність емпатії - перевага.

Assassin7.title: асасин
Assassin7.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] був спеціально навчений як оперативник, щоб бути використаним для дуже ризикованих вбивств. [PAWN_possessive] навички з гвинтівкою були неперевершені.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] з часом, був зраджений [PAWN_possessive] керівництвом, коли ціль дізналася про замовлення та запропонувала підтримувати їх майбутні проєкти. [PAWN_nameDef] поклявся більше нікому не довіряти.

Assembler69.title: складальник
Assembler69.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] працював на фабричній мануфактурі, збираючи продукти з допомогою роботів.

Athlete47.title: атлет
Athlete47.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] став професійним атлетом в молодому віці. Завдяки [PAWN_possessive] навичкам, [PAWN_pronoun] був здатний покинути [PAWN_possessive] рідний світ і вступити в утопічний університет наук і технологій.\n\nЧерез [PAWN_possessive] складний розклад і інтровертну натуру, [PAWN_pronoun] став соціально невмілим.

AwkwardNerd48.title: дивакуватий нерд
AwkwardNerd48.desc: Завжди в захваті від машин, [PAWN_nameDef] проводив [PAWN_possessive] час вивчаючи робототехніку й голографію. [PAWN_pronoun] надавав перевагу компанії [PAWN_possessive] наукових витворів іншим людям.

AWOLSoldier49.title: солдат в самоволці
AWOLSoldier49.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] був піхотинцем.\n\nКоли [PAWN_pronoun] був інформований про відправлення [PAWN_possessive] на Війну Зінноа-Зартца, [PAWN_pronoun] вирішив, що [PAWN_pronoun] не хотів бути солдатом. [PAWN_pronoun] Втік через воєнний космоліт.

BalletDancer81.title: танцюрист балету
BalletDancer81.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] був танцюристом у традиційній балетній трупі. [PAWN_pronoun] майстерно оволодів древніми рухами і розважав тисячі.

BanditLeader74.title: лідер бандитів
BanditLeader74.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] піднімався в рядах кримінальної організації, з часом ставши лідером одного з їх найдальшого осередку бандитів. [PAWN_possessive] собака Рест ніколи не покидала [PAWN_possessive] сторони.

Banished68.title: вигнанець
Banished68.desc: Плем'я, в якому був [PAWN_nameDef], вигнало [PAWN_objective] після кривавого конфлікту. [PAWN_pronoun] дуже довго виживав в лісах.

BanishedSoldier85.title: солдат-вигнанець
BanishedSoldier85.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] became the most physically intimidating of the slaves, spending [PAWN_possessive] little free time obsessively sculpting [PAWN_possessive] body. [PAWN_possessive] efforts eventually paid off when the lord offered [PAWN_objective] a job as a personal bodyguard.\n\nLater, when [PAWN_pronoun] plotted to use [PAWN_possessive] position to kill the lord and free the slaves, [PAWN_pronoun] was discovered and barely escaped with [PAWN_possessive] life.

Bartender62.title: бармен
Bartender62.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a bartender in a seedy establishment. The job was one part drink-mixing, one part diplomacy, and one part head-bashing.

BattlefieldTech52.title: battlefield tech
BattlefieldTech52.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] had received firearms training, but [PAWN_possessive] work was focused on technical adaptation and manipulation of combat mechanoids on the battlefield.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] developed PTSD after narrowly escaping a primitive firebomb attack in a wheat field. The army medically discharged [PAWN_objective] from service.

BattleMechanic27.title: бойовий механік
BattleMechanic27.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a tech-obsessed mercenary in an early fusion-era system.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] was unusually obsessed with gathering the right gear, and often customized [PAWN_possessive] own equipment with original modifications.

Beastmaster67.title: beastmaster
Beastmaster67.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s family had more children than they had proper titles to inherit. Being of low rank in the birth order, [PAWN_nameDef] was given the honorary title of beastmaster.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] managed the family's extensive menagerie. While [PAWN_pronoun] never worked hands-on with the beasts, [PAWN_pronoun] connected with them. Few others appreciated [PAWN_objective] the way they did.

BeastSlayer67.title: вбивця звірів
BeastSlayer67.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] подорожував між планетами, слідкуючи за новинами про напади тварин. [PAWN_pronoun] would camp on the planet for weeks, learning about [PAWN_possessive] prey before striking. [PAWN_pronoun] most enjoyed hunting thrumbos.\n\nPreferring to work alone, [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed the thrill of the hunt, and the meat from the kill.

BehaviourResearch74.title: дослідник поведінки
BehaviourResearch74.desc: Captured as a feral child, [PAWN_nameDef] was forced into the ways of modern society. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly adapted and became a behavioural researcher, eventually owning a private facility.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] specialized in canines, but learned a great deal about all animals. [PAWN_pronoun] never had interest in plants, however.

BiosphereManager95.title: менеджер біосфери
BiosphereManager95.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived on a peaceful glitterworld where all menial work was done by robots and people devoted themselves to leisure. [PAWN_pronoun] managed the plant and animal life of a sprawling park, where citizens came to admire the natural beauty.

BlackjackPlayer76.title: гравець у Блекджек
BlackjackPlayer76.desc: The only useful skill [PAWN_nameDef] learned from [PAWN_possessive] tough military school was card-counting. [PAWN_pronoun] amassed many enemies by cheating at casinos, becoming ever more edgy and violent as the threat of retaliation grew.\n\nWhen [PAWN_pronoun] was finally caught, they burned half [PAWN_possessive] skin off. [PAWN_pronoun] could never face fire or violence again.

Blacksmith7.title: коваль
Blacksmith7.desc: As a blacksmith on a medieval world, [PAWN_nameDef] gained a reputation for the high quality of [PAWN_possessive] work. [PAWN_pronoun] wasn't bad at using the swords [PAWN_pronoun] forged either.

Blacksmith72.title: коваль
Blacksmith72.desc: As a smith on a medieval world, [PAWN_nameDef] gained a reputation for the high quality of [PAWN_possessive] work. [PAWN_pronoun] wasn't bad at using the swords [PAWN_pronoun] forged either.

BlacksmithShooter21.title: blacksmith shooter
BlacksmithShooter21.desc: As a young blacksmith, [PAWN_nameDef]'s family shop was raided by the police. [PAWN_pronoun] shot two officers before they knocked [PAWN_objective] out and arrested him.\n\nSentenced to life in prison, [PAWN_nameDef] learned about traveling and raiding from other criminals.

BlacksmithsSon73.title: син коваля
BlacksmithsSon73.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s father owned the blacksmith shop in an run-down old city district. [PAWN_nameDef] would help [PAWN_possessive] father whenever [PAWN_pronoun] could.\n\nLater, [PAWN_possessive] father took [PAWN_objective] as a blacksmith's apprentice and raised [PAWN_objective] as a man. [PAWN_nameDef] also took on shooting as a hobby.

BlessedChild46.title: благословенне дитя
BlessedChild46.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born under auspicious circumstances to a midworld spiritual group and held in reverence throughout [PAWN_possessive] childhood.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] learned to take care of the poor and give succor to the faithful from an early age.

BloodgameSurvivor6.title: bloodgame survivor
BloodgameSurvivor6.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was sold to the Corestars Entertainment Company and used as meat in one of the company's system-wide broadcast shows.\n \n[PAWN_possessive] manipulative nature made [PAWN_objective] quite a nightmare, even to the audience. [PAWN_pronoun] was kicked out and exiled to a planet full of deadly animals, criminals and armed camera-drones.

BloodyDentist9.title: bloody dentist
BloodyDentist9.desc: After studying at a famous college, [PAWN_nameDef]'s weak personality eventually snapped under the strain of angry administrators and whining patients. [PAWN_pronoun] went on a secret murder spree, killing many of those under [PAWN_possessive] care.\n\nAfter a pursuit, [PAWN_pronoun] managed to escape [PAWN_possessive] planet and travel to a new world.

BloodyWanderer28.title: кривавий мандрівник
BloodyWanderer28.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a wanderer, traveling from town to town, taking odd jobs and stealing to live.\n\nOne day, [PAWN_pronoun] had a mental break and went on a long rampage, destroying several towns and killing many. [PAWN_pronoun] eventually calmed, but [PAWN_possessive] bloodlust never left [PAWN_objective].

Bodyguard58.title: охоронець
Bodyguard58.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] protected whoever paid [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_pronoun] gained proficiency in many different combat forms, and was known for [PAWN_possessive] ruthlessness against those who crossed [PAWN_objective].

BodyguardTrainee54.title: охоронець-стажер
BodyguardTrainee54.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a famously skilled family of bodyguards. [PAWN_possessive] mothers Elena and Victoria forced [PAWN_objective] into many dangerous situations, training [PAWN_objective] to put [PAWN_possessive] client's well-being over [PAWN_possessive] own.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] was taught about many herbs and natural poisons to help [PAWN_objective] prevent clients from being poisoned.

BoneCollector14.title: збирач кісток
BoneCollector14.desc: Born to a family of fortune hunters, [PAWN_nameDef] always had a passion for ancient history.\n\nThough never a tough or social boy, [PAWN_pronoun] loved to dig through history books as well as dirt piles.

Bookworm19.title: bookworm
Bookworm19.desc: Rather than socialize with the other children, [PAWN_nameDef] preferred to get lost in literature. [PAWN_pronoun] taught [PAWN_objective]self to read at an early age with books bought from passing traders.

Bookworm3.title: книжковий хробак
Bookworm3.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] youth in the library, reading every book [PAWN_pronoun] could about the technical marvels of space travel, the engineering ingenuity of the space-faring pioneers, and the horrible yet fascinating tales of mechanoid wars. [PAWN_pronoun] vowed that one day, [PAWN_pronoun] would see these things for [PAWN_objective]self.

BountyHunter17.title: мисливець за головами
BountyHunter17.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a self-employed bounty hunter. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] days hunting space pirates and collecting cash bounties.

BountyHunter41.title: мисливець за головами
BountyHunter41.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a bounty hunter on a massive glitterworld. [PAWN_pronoun] worked sensitive assignments for extremely wealthy clients, and was known for quiet execution and total discretion.

BountyHunter93.title: мисливець за головами
BountyHunter93.desc: When the civil war ended, [PAWN_nameDef] had to find a new way to use [PAWN_possessive] fighting skills. [PAWN_pronoun] decided to hunt down war criminals and soon realized that [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed capturing bad guys by any means necessary.

BoyScout42.title: бойскаут
BoyScout42.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was in a boy scout troop on a midworld.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] learned many survival skills including how to thrive in the outdoors and how to tend to basic wounds.

BoySoldier14.title: дитина-солдат
BoySoldier14.desc: War may never change - but the cast of characters does.\n\nBorn on a violent urbworld, [PAWN_nameDef] was trained from a young age to fight the wars of others, and became rather good at it.

Brave88.title: сміливець
Brave88.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] володіє іквами, сокирами, палицями та іншою зброєю ближнього бою у битвах за [PAWN_possessive] плем'я.

Brigand68.title: розбійник
Brigand68.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] летів з бандою розбійників, яких [PAWN_pronoun] вважав за друзів. [PAWN_pronoun] навіть мав [PAWN_possessive] власний корабель - Лайноскоп 2000.

BrokenSoldier29.title: знівечений солдат
BrokenSoldier29.desc:
[PAWN_pronoun] був дужим солдатом у довгій війні за спадщину. У [PAWN_possessive] фінальній битві, [PAWN_possessive] підрозділ був принесений в жертву для прикриття відступу. [PAWN_nameDef] дивився, як [PAWN_possessive] товарищі гинуть, і був єдиним уцілілим.

Пережите зламало [PAWN_objective] зсередини, залишивши [PAWN_objective] без способу стримувати [PAWN_possessive] емоції.

В лікарні [PAWN_nameDef] навчився малювати.

BrothelGofer84.title: brothel gofer
BrothelGofer84.desc: Born on a steam-powered midworld wracked by a century of economic crises, [PAWN_nameDef] went to work at a young age. Scrounging, shoe-polishing, sewing - [PAWN_pronoun] did it all. But [PAWN_pronoun] was most known as a brothel gofer, delivering all manner of aphrodisiacs and chemicals to the girls' rooms.

BrutalThief59.title: жорстокий злодій
BrutalThief59.desc: Growing up in a gang, [PAWN_nameDef] learned the brutality of the streets.\n\nKnowing that showing weakness could be fatal, [PAWN_pronoun] closed [PAWN_objective]self off from others.

BuddingArtist44.title: budding artist
BuddingArtist44.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a knack for art. Traders and collectors from many different societies sought to buy [PAWN_possessive] creations.

Builder96.title: будівельник
Builder96.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked on construction sites, building everyday structures according to [PAWN_possessive] boss' instructions.

Bully70.title: bully
Bully70.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] tormented other children for fun. To keep [PAWN_objective] busy, an elder assigned [PAWN_objective] to a hunting party at an early age.

BunkerKid41.title: bunker kid
BunkerKid41.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in an underground shelter, waiting for radioactive fallout to subside. [PAWN_possessive] rich family had gained access to a luxury bunker city, while billions died on the surface.\n\nDetermined to one day seek revenge against the hated enemy, [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time practicing shooting in [PAWN_possessive] private training facility.

BushSniper94.title: снайпер-лісник
BushSniper94.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s peaceful life was cut short when [PAWN_possessive] country was brutally invaded.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] was drafted into service as soon as [PAWN_pronoun] was of legal age, and quickly showed an aptitude for rifles. [PAWN_pronoun] spent months living in the forests picking off soldiers who dared cross the border.

BusinessGangster58.title: бізнес-гангстер
BusinessGangster58.desc: Staying one step ahead of the law, [PAWN_nameDef] became a legitimate businessman and silenced anyone who dared say otherwise. As proprietor of brothels, speakeasies and eateries, [PAWN_nameDef]'s good fortune continued while [PAWN_possessive] competition suffered a series of unfortunate and unexplained accidents.

Cadet96.title: кадет
Cadet96.desc: Born on the planet New China, [PAWN_nameDef]'s father was a police chief and kept extremely strict watch over [PAWN_possessive] son.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] had to do military-style drill exercises every day and keep [PAWN_possessive] room spotlessly clean, always ready for inspection. [PAWN_pronoun] came to abhor violence.

CaravanChild29.title: caravan child
CaravanChild29.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a urbworld merchant ship to an entrepreneurial mother and an absent father. Born male, [PAWN_pronoun] disliked boy stuff, and got into [PAWN_possessive] mother’s things all the time.\n\nEventually, [PAWN_pronoun] traveled with [PAWN_possessive] mother to a glitterworld and spent [PAWN_possessive] savings on a body [PAWN_pronoun] was happy with.

Caravaneer53.title: караванвожатий
Caravaneer53.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the leader of a caravan. [PAWN_pronoun] was responsible for the safety of [PAWN_possessive] caravan and was the head negotiator in countless trade deals.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] and [PAWN_possessive] people prospered, but their wealth made them a target for brigands. They often had to take up arms to fend off bandits and highwaymen.

CaravanTraveler6.title: караванник
CaravanTraveler6.desc: Born to a family of traveling merchants, [PAWN_nameDef] was mentored by [PAWN_possessive] father in the ways of being a trader. [PAWN_pronoun] was often tasked with caring for the pack animals. Due to [PAWN_possessive] nomadic lifestyle, [PAWN_pronoun] hunted and bartered for [PAWN_possessive] food.

CargoPilot58.title: cargo pilot
CargoPilot58.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was brought up by cargo hands on a long-haul ore transport ship. [PAWN_pronoun] perfected [PAWN_possessive] skills at trading and manipulation of people while running weapons between systems.

Carver1.title: carver
Carver1.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] carved artworks for [PAWN_possessive] tribe from wood, stone, and occasionally, more exotic materials. The work was sometimes sold, and sometimes kept to beautify settlements and provide a focus for rituals.

CasketBuilder52.title: casket builder
CasketBuilder52.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was fascinated with cryptosleep, and spent [PAWN_possessive] life learning about the mysterious technology.\n\nWorking as an assembler on a midworld, [PAWN_nameDef] built an experimental prototype casket from discarded parts. Unfortunately, while [PAWN_pronoun] was searching for the final component, [PAWN_possessive] home was leveled by a bomb.

Castaway57.title: вигнанець
Castaway57.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the only survivor of a ship crash on an unhabited animal world. For many years until [PAWN_possessive] rescue [PAWN_pronoun] scrounged an existence out of whatever [PAWN_pronoun] could find.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] survival skills became razor-sharp, but spending so long alone severely dampened [PAWN_possessive] conversatial abilities.

Castaway81.title: вигнанець
Castaway81.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a passenger on a routine interstellar transit. When [PAWN_possessive] ship was destroyed, [PAWN_pronoun] lived as a castaway on an uninhabited planet for several years.

CatHerder4.title: котячий пастух
CatHerder4.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] helped out in [PAWN_possessive] father's cat breeding business, socializing, herding, and feeding hundreds of cats.\n\nWhen [PAWN_pronoun] refused to clean up after the cats, [PAWN_pronoun] was transferred to the breeding science division.

CaveChild17.title: печерне дитя
CaveChild17.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a cave on an tundra planet, and was adopted by a traveling group of entertainers known only as the Wizards. Once a starfaring crew, the Wizards told [PAWN_objective] wondrous stories about the universe.\n\nOne day, the Wizards did not return from scavenging. After years of waiting, [PAWN_nameDef] set off into space to find them.

CaveChild30.title: печерне дитя
CaveChild30.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a large and intricate cave complex that extended deep into a mountainside. [PAWN_pronoun] helped the adults maintain and improve the deep caves.

CaveworldIlluminator23.title: caveworld illuminator
CaveworldIlluminator23.desc: Among tunnel-dwellers, those with vision as strong as [PAWN_nameDef]’s are revered as sages. [PAWN_pronoun] would lead the way, marking spots to dig with bioluminescent fungus and warning others of impending danger.

CaveworldTender20.title: печерний доглядач
CaveworldTender20.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in cave complex deep beneath the surface of an inhospitable world. [PAWN_pronoun] worked with the other children tending the tribe’s fungus crops.

CaveworldTunneler48.title: печерний шахтар
CaveworldTunneler48.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a digger in the massive underground cave complex.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] knows rock so well that [PAWN_pronoun] can almost navigate caves by smell.

CharityWorker36.title: благодійник
CharityWorker36.desc: Glitterworlds are havens of safety and comfort for those lucky enough to live there, but [PAWN_nameDef] could not ignore nearby planets where people suffered in poverty. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] working life appealing for donations and supporting those in need.

Chef52.title: кухар
Chef52.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] ran a high-class restaurant. [PAWN_pronoun] was famous among patrons for [PAWN_possessive] creative culinary specialties, and infamous among kitchen workers for [PAWN_possessive] casual disdain for grunt work.

Chemist73.title: хімік
Chemist73.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a research chemist. [PAWN_pronoun] worked with chemicals, from pharmaceuticals to explosives, to develop new substances and treatments.

Chemist78.title: хімік
Chemist78.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a renowned chemist on a thriving midworld.\n\nAfter performing inhumane experiments that turned men into beasts, [PAWN_pronoun] was arrested and banished to a far-off rimworld.

ChessMaster67.title: майстер шахів
ChessMaster67.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] loved to play chess. [PAWN_pronoun] even earned the nickname [PAWN_nameDef] for some of [PAWN_possessive] craftier moves.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] never got into trouble - mostly because [PAWN_pronoun] was good at not getting caught.

ChiefEngineer62.title: chief engineer
ChiefEngineer62.desc: As chief engineer on board a large spaceship, [PAWN_nameDef] was an expert in all things fiddly and complex.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] relied on other members of the crew for some of the basic necessities of life. [PAWN_pronoun] and [PAWN_possessive] ship eventually disappeared into a longsleep voyage of exploration.

ChildKnave69.title: child-knave
ChildKnave69.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a child-knave of King Loteric. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed the training with wooden sticks and engaging others in close combat. [PAWN_pronoun] adapted quickly to the heat of battle and was good at spreading fire.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] served [PAWN_possessive] lord well, until the king died in an unfortunate accident.

ChildOfDrifters18.title: child of drifters
ChildOfDrifters18.desc: Ever since [PAWN_pronoun] was very small, [PAWN_nameDef] never knew a home beyond [PAWN_possessive] parent's ship. Their nomadic meandering provided a constant change of scenery. [PAWN_possessive] life was often perilous but never dull, and [PAWN_pronoun] inherited [PAWN_possessive] parents' wanderlust.

ChildOfGlass61.title: скляне дитя
ChildOfGlass61.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised underground on a "marble" planet - a wasteland of radioactive asphalt and toxic fallout.\n\nTo survive on a planet devoid of life, [PAWN_pronoun] had to learn how to farm underground and how to fight without wasting bullets.

ChildProdigy76.title: дитина геній
ChildProdigy76.desc: After graduating college at age twelve, [PAWN_nameDef] devoted [PAWN_possessive] life to becoming immortal. However [PAWN_possessive] research crossed the line when [PAWN_pronoun] tried to modify [PAWN_possessive] body using gene therapy and mechanical augmentation. [PAWN_pronoun] was arrested and condemned to a prison planet.

ChildResearcher32.title: дитина-дослідник
ChildResearcher32.desc: A frightfully intelligent child, [PAWN_nameDef] was kidnapped by a glitterworld corporation and forced to research technologies for weaponizing anti-matter.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] vowed never to invent anything again.

ChildScientist30.title: child scientist
ChildScientist30.desc: After graduating college very young, [PAWN_nameDef] devoted [PAWN_possessive] life to becoming immortal. [PAWN_pronoun] was arrested for trying to genetically modify [PAWN_objective]self.\n\nThe authorities released [PAWN_objective] on the condition that [PAWN_pronoun] would work in a government lab on spacecraft technology. [PAWN_pronoun] was permitted to continue [PAWN_possessive] personal research in [PAWN_possessive] free time.

ChildSlave58.title: дитина-раб
ChildSlave58.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to a poor family on a rimworld. [PAWN_possessive] father sold [PAWN_objective] into slavery at a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] was traded many times. A tycoon bought [PAWN_objective] and sent [PAWN_objective] down into mines to look after machines and to work alongside them.

ChildSpy47.title: дитина-шпигун
ChildSpy47.desc: Children are presumed innocent, which makes them excellent spies. [PAWN_nameDef] was trained in the art of infiltration when [PAWN_pronoun] was just a small child.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] years undercover gave [PAWN_objective] experience with social manipulation and lying, but [PAWN_pronoun] never had a normal education.

ChildSpy84.title: дитина-шпигун
ChildSpy84.desc: Children are often presumed innocent, and so make ideal spies. [PAWN_nameDef] was trained in the arts of infiltration and information-gathering when [PAWN_pronoun] was very young.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] spent years behind enemy lines, gathering intel in a brutal war. During this time, [PAWN_pronoun] had limited opportunity for education.

ChildStar74.title: зіркова дитина
ChildStar74.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was well-known throughout [PAWN_possessive] homeworld as a child actor in films and TV shows. [PAWN_possessive] fame put [PAWN_objective] in contact with many different kinds of people, but also tended to get in the way of [PAWN_possessive] education.

ChurchPsychic98.title: church psychic
ChurchPsychic98.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a psychic in the imperial church's psychic school.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] trained [PAWN_possessive] mind to sense the collective emotions and impressions of the people. It was a way to touch the spirit of the empire. It was also a way to root out heretical trends in thought.

CircusPerformer93.title: виконавець у цирку
CircusPerformer93.desc: Growing up in the circus, [PAWN_nameDef] learned a lot of interesting things. More interesting then the balls [PAWN_pronoun] juggled were the pockets [PAWN_pronoun] picked between shows.\n\nA mistake with some firesticks made [PAWN_objective] develop a deathly fear of fire.

CivilEngineer2.title: інженер-будівельник
CivilEngineer2.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a well-known civil engineer. [PAWN_possessive] job involved designing and maintaining rock fortification structures. [PAWN_pronoun] did enough statistical analysis to keep [PAWN_possessive] mind sharp.

CivilServant2.title: держслужбовець
CivilServant2.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a low-ranking administrator for a moribund government bureaucracy. [PAWN_pronoun] is most at home filling out complicated paperwork and playing office politics.

ClanChief14.title: clan chief
ClanChief14.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] managed a small criminal clan on an outlying trade hub world.

ClassClown96.title: class clown
ClassClown96.desc: In the ultra-competitive environs of [PAWN_possessive] glitterworld school, [PAWN_nameDef] always offered to play the class clown to diffuse tension.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] developed a sense of social desperation from this, as well as an appreciation for the artistic side of comedy.

CloneFarmed21.title: clone-farmed
CloneFarmed21.desc: Clone children are seeded into nutrient-rich womb-vats and rapidly grown in a simmed universe. They're harvested later, sometimes for food, sometimes for organs, sometimes for workers - but they're always disposable.

CloneFarmer58.title: clone farmer
CloneFarmer58.desc: Harvesting the products of clone farms is mostly done by the clones themselves - particularly to those whose sims tended towards the social. This clone was one such, who escaped from the farms and headed out to the stars.

ColiseumCleaner54.title: колізейний прибиральник
ColiseumCleaner54.desc: During the 'Inner Destrian War' fallout, [PAWN_possessive] parents were captured and [PAWN_pronoun] was born into a life of slavery. Forced to clean coliseums after bloody battles for money. Дивиться, чекає, і навчається. Coliseums were the only thing [PAWN_pronoun] ever knew. One night while cleaning the coliseum, [PAWN_possessive] family was murdered.

ColiseumFighter22.title: гладіатор
ColiseumFighter22.desc: Applying the knowledge that [PAWN_pronoun] gained from years around fighters, [PAWN_pronoun] became a successful gladiator in the coliseum that [PAWN_pronoun] once cleaned.

ColonialGovernor78.title: colonial governor
ColonialGovernor78.desc: Disillusioned by rampant government corruption, [PAWN_nameDef] ran for governor and won. However, the local gangs and their pet officials soon forced [PAWN_objective] out of power.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] left the community to return to [PAWN_possessive] life as a marshal.

Colonist22.title: колоніст
Colonist22.desc: As a child, [PAWN_pronoun] was launched into space as part of an interstellar colonization program.

ColonyEngineer7.title: colony engineer
ColonyEngineer7.desc: The children took over the facility, and they declared independence from the corporation.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] had used the VR system to become a master engineer, and [PAWN_pronoun] worked diligently to prepare the colony for the corporation's inevitable return.

ColonyKid47.title: colony kid
ColonyKid47.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born the child of two doctors in a small colony. Because of [PAWN_possessive] parents, [PAWN_pronoun] was always interested in science and medicine.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] never really got along with other children, and as a result became withdrawn and unsociable.

ColonySettler53.title: поселенець
ColonySettler53.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a settler on a new colony world.\n\nSuch a life requires a jack-of-all trades at basic hands-on tasks.

ComaChild57.title: коматозна дитина
ComaChild57.desc: A childhood accident put [PAWN_nameDef] into a coma. [PAWN_pronoun] didn’t wake up until [PAWN_pronoun] was in [PAWN_possessive] late teens. [PAWN_possessive] body never recovered from the years of inactivity, but people tend to take pity on [PAWN_objective] when they hear [PAWN_possessive] story.

CombatEngineer30.title: бойовий інженер
CombatEngineer30.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was recruited by the military as an engineer and set to work improving the navy's space shuttles. The harsh training taught [PAWN_objective] how to build and repair military vehicles and structures.\n\nOne mission left [PAWN_nameDef] with pyrophobia and a strong desire to avoid plants.

CombatEngineer4.title: бойовий інженер
CombatEngineer4.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] became a combat engineer. [PAWN_pronoun] built bases, fixed guns, and repaired vehicles for the army - when [PAWN_pronoun] wasn't shooting at people, that is.

CombatMedic82.title: combat medic
CombatMedic82.desc: After [PAWN_possessive] home country entered a large-scale war, [PAWN_nameDef] was drafted into the army as a combat medic.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] few years in the trenches trying to keep [PAWN_possessive] fellow soldiers alive gave [PAWN_objective] an acute sense for first aid. Losing many friend has made [PAWN_objective] stoic and reserved.

CombatMedtech59.title: бойовий медтех
CombatMedtech59.desc: As a military medtech, [PAWN_nameDef]'s job was to fix and build anything [PAWN_pronoun] could get [PAWN_possessive] hands on, from living people to machines and mechs.\n\nSent into dangerous areas, [PAWN_pronoun] never had a problem saving soldiers' lives and building the technology and machines needed to win.

CombatNegotiator31.title: combat negotiator
CombatNegotiator31.desc: After escaping [PAWN_possessive] homeworld, [PAWN_nameDef] took [PAWN_possessive] skills to the stars.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] chose to operate as a hired gun, working for various rebel organizations, enslaved groups, and merchant enclaves. [PAWN_possessive] specialty was negotiation in combat situations.

CommonerHeir5.title: Commoner heir
CommonerHeir5.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a street urchin on a feudal steamworld.\n\n After [PAWN_pronoun] tried to steal food from the palace, the emperor, desperate to secure an heir, took [PAWN_objective] in and groomed [PAWN_objective] to be next in line for the throne.

CommonerLord45.title: Commoner lord
CommonerLord45.desc: After years of training in martial arts and diplomacy, [PAWN_nameDef] was eventually given land and subjects of [PAWN_possessive] own to rule.\n\n Because of [PAWN_nameDef]'s commoner heritage, the other lords disapproved. They framed [PAWN_objective] for a heinous crime, and the emperor had no choice but to exile [PAWN_objective].

Computer80.title: комп'ютер
Computer80.desc: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] crafted complex algorithms. [PAWN_pronoun] was used as a "human computer" for most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood. This left [PAWN_objective] socially awkward and rather scrawny.\n\n Despite the solitary confinement, [PAWN_nameDef] developed a great imagination to occupy [PAWN_possessive] idle time.

ComputerEngineer10.title: комп'ютерний інженер
ComputerEngineer10.desc: Bored of [PAWN_possessive] code-monkey office job and missing the glory days of the Academy, [PAWN_nameDef] saw a commercial about the frontier where "only the strong survive".\n\nWith [PAWN_possessive] wife Morgan, [PAWN_nameDef] undertook a journey into the unknown.

ComputerEngineer36.title: комп'ютерний інженер
ComputerEngineer36.desc: Leveraging [PAWN_possessive] childhood experience, [PAWN_nameDef] became a computer engineer. [PAWN_pronoun] also learned to craft delicate sculptures and random electronics for fun.\n\n [PAWN_nameDef] became fond of technology and mostly gave up on talking to people. Using computers as friends has left [PAWN_nameDef] unable to care for others.

ComputerGeek62.title: computer geek
ComputerGeek62.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood on [PAWN_possessive] computer, typing away, never knowing when to get up and eat.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] had a very narrow interest: hacking cryptosleep safety protocols.

ConArtist80.title: шахрай
ConArtist80.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] never created anything in [PAWN_possessive] life. [PAWN_pronoun] did, however, prove to be a natural at getting others to give [PAWN_objective] what they had created.

ConceptualArtist39.title: концептуальний митець
ConceptualArtist39.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was well-known in art circles on [PAWN_possessive] home world for [PAWN_possessive] unique and creative conceptual artworks.\n\nNobody was sure exactly what [PAWN_pronoun] was trying to communicate, but [PAWN_possessive] pieces were highly valued by collectors.

ConstructionEngineer32.title: інженер-будівельник
ConstructionEngineer32.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a construction worker. [PAWN_pronoun] lead a team which built everything from office blocks to cathedrals.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] busy job and numerous nearby fast-food outlets meant [PAWN_pronoun] never cooked for [PAWN_objective]self.

ConstructionGrunt84.title: construction grunt
ConstructionGrunt84.desc: Growing up in [PAWN_possessive] father's lab, [PAWN_nameDef] was given the life of an intellectual elite. [PAWN_pronoun] got everything [PAWN_pronoun] desired, and price was never an object.\n\nHowever [PAWN_nameDef] did not partake in the luxury given to him. Instead, [PAWN_pronoun] pursued more physical, and - in [PAWN_possessive] father's eyes - lower-class jobs.

ConventChild16.title: монастирська дитина
ConventChild16.desc: The child of an illicit affair, [PAWN_nameDef] was bought up by nuns in a medieval convent. [PAWN_pronoun] learned the value of hard work and submission, but was taught that technology is heretical.

CoreDilettante33.title: core dilettante
CoreDilettante33.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] formative years on a glitterworld in the core region, where [PAWN_pronoun] and [PAWN_possessive] friends pursued lives of idle pleasure.\n\nAs [PAWN_pronoun] grew up, [PAWN_pronoun] began to find the life of ease unfulfilling. [PAWN_pronoun] decided to look for a more challenging path.

CoreworldJeweler19.title: coreworld jeweler
CoreworldJeweler19.desc: After [PAWN_nameDef] had completed all of [PAWN_possessive] surgeries, [PAWN_pronoun] found that [PAWN_pronoun] had a lot of time and energy to dedicate to [PAWN_possessive] passion: trinket crafting. [PAWN_pronoun] spent years perfecting [PAWN_possessive] art as a jeweler, then left [PAWN_possessive] home world to sell [PAWN_possessive] wares across the galaxy.

CoreworldStudent50.title: coreworld student
CoreworldStudent50.desc: Born a male named Alex, [PAWN_nameDef] didn't fit in well with the other boys. When very young, [PAWN_pronoun] preferred creative pursuits, such as crafting jewelry, over sports. [PAWN_pronoun] felt [PAWN_pronoun] had the wrong body. Luckily, [PAWN_possessive] family and friends supported [PAWN_possessive] sex reassignment; as a teen, [PAWN_pronoun] underwent surgery to become a female.

CorpBredStudent54.title: студент корп-виховання
CorpBredStudent54.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was bred to become an executive for the space exploration corporation that owned [PAWN_possessive] home planet. [PAWN_possessive] family had been working for that corporation for four generations.\n\nAt age five, [PAWN_pronoun] enrolled at the corporate academy where [PAWN_pronoun] learned loyalty and ruthlessness. [PAWN_nameDef] excelled in finding diplomatic solutions where others would need violence.

CorporateBuilder58.title: корпоративний будівельник
CorporateBuilder58.desc: Even as [PAWN_pronoun] stewed in [PAWN_possessive] own wasted potential, [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_pronoun] had a knack for moving objects quickly. It was just what the planetary mega-corps wanted in their construction divisions.\n\nUnfortunately, the monotonous work erased [PAWN_possessive] remaining creative impulses.

CorporateDrone10.title: corporate drone
CorporateDrone10.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a very large office complex along with thousands of other suited drones.\n\nThe work itself consisted of endless organizational drudgery and pointless meetings, punctuated by the occasional performance review.

CorporateFixer36.title: corporate fixer
CorporateFixer36.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a fixer for an energy corporation. [PAWN_pronoun] work required knowing when to push, when to pull, when to back down and when to strike. The job fit [PAWN_possessive] natural lack of empathy.\n\nWhile violence was unusual, [PAWN_nameDef] stayed prepared for anything.

CorporateManager76.title: corporate manager
CorporateManager76.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a massive open-plan office, ensuring that [PAWN_possessive] assigned team of workers stayed mostly on-task.\n\nThe job was intensely political. In order to advance, [PAWN_nameDef] learned how to arrange things so [PAWN_pronoun] could take credit for work done by almost anyone.

CorporateSlave22.title: corporate slave
CorporateSlave22.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a colony owned by a large glitterworld corporation. All children had virtual reality devices attached by force, and were raised in a brutal digital world.\n\nConstantly forced to fight others for the entertainment of the wealthy, gunplay and tactics became the center of [PAWN_nameDef]'s universe.

CorpResearcher71.title: corp researcher
CorpResearcher71.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was sold to a corporation and put to work as a corporate slave doing scientific research.\n\nUnable to adapt to the social politics of [PAWN_possessive] workplace, [PAWN_pronoun] buried [PAWN_objective]self in [PAWN_possessive] work and failed to progress up the corporate ladder. Every day, [PAWN_pronoun] yearned to be left alone.

CorpResearcher93.title: corp researcher
CorpResearcher93.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a leading researcher for a massive space exploration corporation.

CorpStudent95.title: corp student
CorpStudent95.desc: De Dion was bred to become an executive officer for the large space trading corporation that owned [PAWN_possessive] home planet. [PAWN_possessive] family had been working for that corporation for seven generations.\n\nAt age six, [PAWN_pronoun] started to study at the corporate academy, where [PAWN_pronoun] became a loyal follower and a ruthless executive.

CosmeticReject64.title: косметичний брак
CosmeticReject64.desc: Living on the streets, [PAWN_nameDef] submitted [PAWN_objective]self to an unethical cosmetics lab in exchange for food and shelter.\n\nAfter some painful cosmetic modification, [PAWN_nameDef] barely resembles [PAWN_possessive] former self. Having been forced to work for the lab until [PAWN_pronoun] was rescued, [PAWN_nameDef] is now too afraid to lash out at anyone.

CosmeticSurgeon36.title: косметичний хірург
CosmeticSurgeon36.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a terrible bedside manner due to [PAWN_possessive] abrasiveness. [PAWN_pronoun] often bullied [PAWN_possessive] patients into getting cosmetic surgery. [PAWN_pronoun] made a lot of money this way.\n\nWhile very studious and careful in [PAWN_possessive] work, [PAWN_pronoun] never had to lift a finger doing domestic chores.

CostumeCrafter41.title: costume crafter
CostumeCrafter41.desc: By day, [PAWN_nameDef] was an office worker on a midworld. At night, [PAWN_pronoun] designed and built elaborate monster costumes for science fiction conventions.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] learned a great deal about sewing. Unfortunately this came at the cost of being able to cook anything more complex than an instant meal.

Counselor26.title: радник
Counselor26.desc: A terrifying trauma when [PAWN_nameDef] was a young adult caused [PAWN_objective] to develop a serious eating disorder. With counseling [PAWN_pronoun] learned to have a healthier relationship with food, and decided to put [PAWN_possessive] new skills to use helping others overcome their emotional problems.

CountryChild95.title: сільське дитя
CountryChild95.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised up to fear God and love [PAWN_possessive] country. [PAWN_pronoun] was a genuine backwoods kid. [PAWN_pronoun] always worked hard to earn respect rather than demanding it.

CountryLordling92.title: country lordling
CountryLordling92.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a noble family's manor in the outer country. [PAWN_possessive] early years were full of lessons in horseback riding, politics, and religion.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] friends found many ways to break the rules and have fun in the fields and forests.

CowFarmer39.title: корівник
CowFarmer39.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a rimworld, under the tyranny of [PAWN_possessive] father, who forced [PAWN_objective] to work every day on the farm. [PAWN_pronoun] dreamed of escaping [PAWN_possessive] father and exploring the universe.\n\nOne day, when the trade ship was overhead, [PAWN_pronoun] stowed away among the goods in the launch pods, and escaped into space.

CraftShaper37.title: craft shaper
CraftShaper37.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] locked [PAWN_objective]self in [PAWN_possessive] studio for years, ordering delivery food to save time on cooking.\n\nEventually, [PAWN_possessive] creations brought [PAWN_objective] the highest honor on Semantic World: Permission to materialize any design in minutes using the most advanced technologies.

CrashBaby32.title: crash baby
CrashBaby32.desc: As a baby, [PAWN_nameDef] was the only survivor of a deadly spacecraft crash. A passing tribe discovered [PAWN_objective] in the wreckage and adopted [PAWN_objective].

CrimeBossChild39.title: crime boss' child
CrimeBossChild39.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was adopted child of a notorious crime boss. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught all facets of the family business, from smuggling to inventive ways of killing.\n\nWhen the family was attacked, [PAWN_possessive] father ordered [PAWN_objective] to hide in a secret cryptosleep vault.

CrimeLord10.title: кримінальний авторитет
CrimeLord10.desc: Through brutality and cruelty, [PAWN_nameDef] rose to become a crime lord.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] relied less on [PAWN_possessive] fists and more on [PAWN_possessive] guns. [PAWN_possessive] reputation spread quickly due to [PAWN_possessive] cold-bloodedness and ruthless methods.

CriminalKingpin36.title: кримінальний шворінь
CriminalKingpin36.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] discovered [PAWN_possessive] gift - people did what [PAWN_pronoun] said, when [PAWN_pronoun] said it. Taking advantage of this, [PAWN_pronoun] set off for the rimworlds to make a name for [PAWN_objective]self in the criminal underworld.\n\nHaving people do things for [PAWN_objective] taught [PAWN_objective] to avoid manual labor at all costs.

CriminalSurgeon99.title: підпольний лікар
CriminalSurgeon99.desc: Being near many injured fellow criminals, [PAWN_nameDef] took it upon [PAWN_objective]self to work on them.\n\nAlthough many people died, [PAWN_pronoun] did get better at using knives.

CropFarmer17.title: crop farmer
CropFarmer17.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] ran a crop farm. [PAWN_pronoun] analyzed soil, agricultural equipment, weather patterns, and price trends to optimize the planting and harvesting of massive crop fields.

CultChild3.title: дитина культу
CultChild3.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a powerful cult which shunned advanced technology and believed that all illness could be cured by cleansing the soul through sacred art.\n\nAfter [PAWN_possessive] first glimpse of the outside world, [PAWN_pronoun] decided to run away.

DataDecoder39.title: data decoder
DataDecoder39.desc: Born on a glitterworld, [PAWN_nameDef] was very interested in the process of documenting information, and quickly became senior glitterpedia recorder.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] was effective at self-study, but [PAWN_pronoun] was lacked in social experiences.

DedicatedStudent12.title: dedicated student
DedicatedStudent12.desc: The child of a wealthy manufacturer, [PAWN_nameDef] was pampered from an early age. [PAWN_pronoun] developed an affinity for reading and art, and a distaste for menial chores.\n\nA revolution brought [PAWN_possessive] father's businesses under state control. Penniless, [PAWN_nameDef] worked hard to complete [PAWN_possessive] education.

DeepSpaceMiner3.title: шахтар в глибокому космосі
DeepSpaceMiner3.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] did the sweaty, grimy work of pulling metal out of asteroids on a deep space rig. [PAWN_pronoun] used [PAWN_possessive] hands-on industrial skills daily - and wasn't bad in a bar fight either.

DeepSpaceSurveyor1.title: deep space surveyor
DeepSpaceSurveyor1.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a deep space surveyor. [PAWN_pronoun] studied which worlds were the most suitable for colonization.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] expeditions were met by hostile natives, green-painted space-women, and wannabe Greek gods. Surviving many firefights, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to build rudimentary lathes and rock cannons to fend off enemies.

Defector78.title: дезертир
Defector78.desc: Early in [PAWN_possessive] adulthood, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to leave the oppressive dictatorship where [PAWN_pronoun] lived. [PAWN_possessive] defection was not well-received, and agents were sent out after [PAWN_objective].\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] spent years on the run, treating [PAWN_possessive] own wounds so no doctor could betray [PAWN_objective]. The ordeal made [PAWN_objective] bitter and untrusting.

Defector95.title: дезертир
Defector95.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] decided to leave the oppressive dictatorship where [PAWN_pronoun] lived. [PAWN_possessive] defection was not well-received, and agents were sent after [PAWN_objective].\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] spent years on the run. Since [PAWN_pronoun] could trust no doctor, [PAWN_pronoun] treated [PAWN_possessive] own wounds. The ordeal made [PAWN_objective] bitter and untrusting.

DefenseLawyer71.title: defense lawyer
DefenseLawyer71.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] found that [PAWN_pronoun] could make more money with a quick word than a blaster. Seeking a job where [PAWN_possessive] silver tongue could be useful, [PAWN_pronoun] turned to the law.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] often defended the illegal speeder racers [PAWN_pronoun] grew up with.

Delinquent13.title: delinquent
Delinquent13.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood behind bars. Following an unsuccessful escape attempt, [PAWN_pronoun] was pressed into the military.

Demolitionist39.title: demolitionist
Demolitionist39.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] manufactured and planted explosives used to breach enemy defenses. Dealing with explosives every day taught [PAWN_objective] to keep a level head and steady hand.

Deserter65.title: deserter
Deserter65.desc: After countless battles for a cause [PAWN_pronoun] did not believe in, [PAWN_nameDef] threw down [PAWN_possessive] arms and deserted. [PAWN_nameDef] lived in isolation, hunted by those [PAWN_pronoun] had deserted.

DesertRat47.title: пустельний щур
DesertRat47.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to a tribe of desert ascetics who wandered the endless wastes.\n\nThey sought a mythical substance they believed could liberate them from ignorance through psychedelic revelation - and usher in a new period of interstellar peace.

DestroyerGeneral26.title: destroyer-general
DestroyerGeneral26.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] held the rank of Destroyer-General in a powerful midworld military.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] was known for [PAWN_possessive] mastery of weapons, and was also a good ship pilot.

Digger66.title: копач
Digger66.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] carved living spaces and mined minerals from the sides of hills and mountains. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to feel at home picking through rock and shoring up cave walls.

DiplomatsChild97.title: дитина дипломата
DiplomatsChild97.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in diplomatic family.\n\nTravelling often, [PAWN_pronoun] was home-schooled and saw the world mostly through a computer.

DisasterSurvivor29.title: переживший катастрофу
DisasterSurvivor29.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s planet collided with a small moon. Everything [PAWN_pronoun] knew as home was destroyed, and [PAWN_possessive] entire family died. [PAWN_pronoun] was left in the ruins to fend for [PAWN_objective]self.

DisasterSurvivor65.title: переживший катастрофу
DisasterSurvivor65.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was uprooted when marauders attacked [PAWN_possessive] family farm, destroying machinery and killing farmhands and beasts alike.\n\nAfter the death of all [PAWN_pronoun] knew, [PAWN_pronoun] was left in the ruins to fend for [PAWN_objective]self.

DiscardedYouth93.title: покинута молодь
DiscardedYouth93.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up isolated on a trash planet. A dumping ground for surrounding glitterworlds, it was a harsh home. As a baby, [PAWN_pronoun] sucked on the tap of a discarded nutrient paste dispenser for comfort.\n\nIn these desperate circumstances, against all odds, [PAWN_pronoun] survived - and thrived.

DischargedSoldier53.title: відставний солдат
DischargedSoldier53.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] prostituted [PAWN_objective]self to fund [PAWN_possessive] drug habits. As an escape, [PAWN_pronoun] joined the military and learned to fight.\n\nToo smart for the army, [PAWN_pronoun] questioned and often disagreed with [PAWN_possessive] superiors' decisions. This eventually led to [PAWN_possessive] dishonorable discharge and left [PAWN_objective] with a chip on [PAWN_possessive] shoulder.

DisciplinedFarmer28.title: дисциплінований фермер
DisciplinedFarmer28.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the younger of two sons on the family farm, a frontier plot that struggled to turn a profit. [PAWN_nameDef]'s father was a strict disciplinarian, constantly at [PAWN_possessive] sons to work harder and keep quiet. [PAWN_nameDef] burnt [PAWN_possessive] hand making breakfast once and swore to cook only when [PAWN_possessive] life was in danger.

DisgracedOfficer19.title: disgraced officer
DisgracedOfficer19.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an officer in an imperial battalion. [PAWN_pronoun] developed the social and combat skills to do [PAWN_possessive] job well and was respected by the men.\n\nWhen [PAWN_possessive] unit came under direct fire for the first time, [PAWN_nameDef] fled to a bunker and hid. [PAWN_pronoun] was demoted and never escaped the disgrace.

DisplacedNoble83.title: зміщений вельможа
DisplacedNoble83.desc: Born on an urbworld to the ruler of three megacities, [PAWN_nameDef]’s prospects looked good - until a violent insurrection overthrew [PAWN_possessive] family. Exile introduced [PAWN_nameDef] to hard work and combat, but some high-born squeamishness remains.

DoomsdayPariah24.title: парія судного дня
DoomsdayPariah24.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] managed to open a vault of otherworldly technology while scavenging a dig site. [PAWN_pronoun] unwittingly triggered a doomsday device that cleansed the planet of all life. More interested in the tech than human life, [PAWN_pronoun] boarded the vault’s spacecraft and departed to find more relics to abuse.

DreadedBaby56.title: страшне дитя
DreadedBaby56.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was found as a baby in a crashed spacecraft. According to the ship's records, [PAWN_pronoun] invented the nuclear device that powered [PAWN_possessive] ship. Apparently, [PAWN_pronoun] also invented the sky and the hamburger, and is said to have fathered a race of tasty golden kittens.

DreadedDude58.title: страшний чувак
DreadedDude58.desc: Some followers say that [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] crew of misfits found the fountain of youth, many, many centuries ago, and that they caused the extinction of the dinosaurs on many planets.\n\nThere's even a religion about them, somewhere, involving noodles and meatballs.

Dreamer79.title: dreamer
Dreamer79.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an expressive child. [PAWN_pronoun] sang often, and made friends very easily, be they young or old, male or female.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] hated fighting, but when made angry, [PAWN_pronoun] could be dangerous. [PAWN_possessive] temper was quick.

Drifter67.title: пройдисвіт
Drifter67.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] never figured out what to do with [PAWN_possessive] life. [PAWN_pronoun] travelled often, taking up casual work wherever [PAWN_pronoun] found it.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] also occasionally worked on a novel that [PAWN_pronoun] knew would be a bestseller - just as soon as [PAWN_pronoun] could find a publisher who was interested.

DromedaryKnight37.title: лицар-дромедарій
DromedaryKnight37.desc: Having caught the eye of [PAWN_possessive] people's Sand King, [PAWN_nameDef] was trained in the Sandy Boomrat fighting technique.\n\nAlways with a camel to carry [PAWN_possessive] things, [PAWN_pronoun] served [PAWN_possessive] sand people faithfully.

Drudge9.title: чорнороб
Drudge9.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was never sure what [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to do with [PAWN_possessive] life. [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time doing low-wage jobs and wondering what [PAWN_possessive] future would be like.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] entertained [PAWN_objective]self with space sims and survival games, dreaming of one day being somewhere more interesting.

DrugLieutenant98.title: drug lieutenant
DrugLieutenant98.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked the drug trade under kingpin Grady Loughman. [PAWN_pronoun] had [PAWN_possessive] men sell drugs when it was profitable, and fight the other cartels when the government came around.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] social skills kept [PAWN_objective] on top of the political game, and [PAWN_pronoun] always had servants to cook and clean.

DrugMule80.title: наркокур'єр
DrugMule80.desc: Raised in an orphanage, [PAWN_nameDef] turned towards the gang life at age ten.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] was exploited by the local gang as a drug mule to traffic "substance F" across rival gang territory. [PAWN_pronoun] took a bullet or two.

DustyFarmHand75.title: dusty farm hand
DustyFarmHand75.desc: From the time [PAWN_nameDef] could walk, [PAWN_pronoun] helped take care of the animals and crops that [PAWN_possessive] people tended in their arid homeland.\n\nThe work toughened [PAWN_objective], but left little time for intellectual activities.

Empath47.title: емпат
Empath47.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an incredibly empathetic child, so much that [PAWN_pronoun] was totally overwhelmed by simple social interactions. Once, [PAWN_pronoun] stepped on a bug and felt so guilty [PAWN_pronoun] cried for an hour.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] did try to use a gun one time, but it went very poorly, as the loud noise made [PAWN_objective] flinch uncontrollably.

EnergeticPopIdol61.title: energetic pop idol
EnergeticPopIdol61.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a glitterworld, training in rapier arts and singing. [PAWN_pronoun] spent several years as an energetic teen pop idol.\n\nHowever, [PAWN_pronoun] decided that the music and modeling industries were not paying [PAWN_objective] enough attention, so [PAWN_pronoun] left.

EnergyResearcher89.title: дослідник-енергетик
EnergyResearcher89.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was working on an idea for rapid communication over long distances. [PAWN_pronoun] made an error which destroyed [PAWN_possessive] lab and several nearby buildings. [PAWN_pronoun] fled the planet to escape the authorities.

Engineer40.title: інженер
Engineer40.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] found a job as a tinkering engineer on the trading hub planet Irithir. Tough local traders forced [PAWN_objective] to learn negotiation skills, and [PAWN_pronoun] made good profits selling refurbished weapons and tools.

EngineeredPilot75.title: engineered pilot
EngineeredPilot75.desc: After [PAWN_possessive] province was besieged by one of its neighbors, [PAWN_nameDef] volunteered for a generic modification program that created pilots for the very fighter craft that [PAWN_pronoun] had helped develop. The modifications allowed [PAWN_objective] to pilot the ship, but also made [PAWN_objective] less able to focus on the people around him.\n\nBy this time, people were calling [PAWN_objective] "Squirrel."

EnvoyOfTheStars19.title: envoy of the stars
EnvoyOfTheStars19.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] entered the diplomatic corps. Honor and tradition were the values [PAWN_pronoun] took with [PAWN_objective] on every mission.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] prestigious position distanced [PAWN_objective] from backbreaking manual labor, allowing [PAWN_objective] to focus on [PAWN_possessive] wordsmithing abilities. [PAWN_pronoun] left the blacksmithing to others.

EscapedConvict90.title: біглий вʼязень
EscapedConvict90.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] denies involvement in the crimes that brought about [PAWN_possessive] incarceration in a brutal penal colony. [PAWN_pronoun] escaped by tunneling beneath the perimeter using modified cutlery.

Evangelist39.title: євангеліст
Evangelist39.desc: As a youth, [PAWN_nameDef] experienced a religious awakening. [PAWN_pronoun] decided to spend the rest of [PAWN_possessive] life spreading the word of [PAWN_possessive] deity, the beauty of its culture, and its unusual medical tradition.

ExecutiveOfficer5.title: executive officer
ExecutiveOfficer5.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an executive officer for a large space trading corporation. After a failed attempt at manipulating [PAWN_possessive] way up the corporate ladder, [PAWN_pronoun] was framed for the rape and murder of another executive and [PAWN_possessive] family.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] was found guilty. However, because of [PAWN_possessive] family's influence, [PAWN_pronoun] was exiled instead of put to death.

ExiledPrince58.title: принц-вигнанець
ExiledPrince58.desc: A member of a royal family, [PAWN_nameDef] was exiled for shaming [PAWN_possessive] family.\n\nLiving in a foreign land, mostly alone, [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time making huts and houses to live in. [PAWN_pronoun] found little time in an average day for enjoyment, and lost all [PAWN_possessive] friends and family.

ExiledResearcher44.title: дослідник-вигнанець
ExiledResearcher44.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s love of robotics was not appreciated in [PAWN_possessive] technophobic empire. The High Cardinal of the system excommunicated her, and [PAWN_pronoun] was never allowed to return.

ExoticChef96.title: exotic chef
ExoticChef96.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] has always gone overboard when it comes to food. [PAWN_pronoun] is always seeking new and exotic ingredients.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] quest for ingredients has brought [PAWN_objective] into some close calls with local flora and fauna.

ExpertHandyman8.title: різноробочий-експерт
ExpertHandyman8.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a traveling engineer. [PAWN_pronoun] fixed things ranging from a simple communications array to the intricate software harness enveloping [PAWN_possessive] ship's AI persona. Nothing is beyond repair for [PAWN_objective].

Explorer49.title: мандрівник
Explorer49.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled from planet to planet, gathering samples, stories, and research. [PAWN_pronoun] hoped one day to compile a record of every animal, plant, mineral, and machine and device in known space: The Complete Traveler's Guide to the RimWorlds.

ExplorerWriter10.title: дослідник-письменник
ExplorerWriter10.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled from planet to planet, gathering samples, stories, and research. \n\n[PAWN_possessive] goal was to bring together enough knowledge to make a survival guide for future generations.

ExplosivesExpert26.title: експерт по вибухівці
ExplosivesExpert26.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an explosive engineer employed in mines. [PAWN_pronoun] took [PAWN_possessive] job very seriously and was well-versed in the technicalities - so much so that [PAWN_pronoun] refused to demean [PAWN_objective]self by helping with the clean-up once [PAWN_possessive] carefully-calculated explosion was complete.

FactionLeader74.title: лідер фракції
FactionLeader74.desc: Early in [PAWN_possessive] adulthood, [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_objective]self surrounded by a gaggle of low-lifes. \n\nFor fun, [PAWN_pronoun] gathered them and lead them to a certain death. [PAWN_pronoun] knew then that [PAWN_pronoun] had the talent to realize [PAWN_possessive] ambitions of leadership.

FactoryDrone58.title: factory drone
FactoryDrone58.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a large factory city on an industrial world.\n\nSince poverty was rampant and food scarce, [PAWN_pronoun] worked for whatever wages [PAWN_pronoun] could get. This wasn't an easy life, but [PAWN_nameDef] never shied away from a hard day's work.

FactoryWorker58.title: працівник заводу
FactoryWorker58.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] did menial, unskilled work in an industrial factory. [PAWN_possessive] job also included caring for the mules and horses which transported the goods.

FallenOfficial12.title: fallen official
FallenOfficial12.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an official for an autocratic government.\n\nWhen [PAWN_possessive] superiors demanded [PAWN_pronoun] participate in atrocities, [PAWN_nameDef] resigned and escaped from [PAWN_possessive] homeworld with nothing but the clothes on [PAWN_possessive] back.

FallenProdigy40.title: геній занепалого світу
FallenProdigy40.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a glitterworld falling into chaos. [PAWN_possessive] father was killed in action.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] struggled for a scholarship at Utmaior Academy and had to prove [PAWN_possessive] right to be there. A child genius, [PAWN_pronoun] was bullied as a charity case and couldn't make friends with the other kids.

FarmBoy64.title: farm boy
FarmBoy64.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked on [PAWN_possessive] family's farm, looking after the animals and treating them when they were injured.
